title: Geelong Waterfront Escape near Eastern Beach with Daily Breakfast, Valet Parking & Daily Drink
description:
Bask in the idyllic charms of one of Victoria's finest regional cities at this chic Novotel retreat, perfectly overlooking the city's sparkling waterfront. Home to a thrilling culinary scene and a booming events calendar, this stylish abode in the heart of the CBD makes for an ideal base to explore the surrounding region.

Explore the Great Ocean Road, wander along the Art Deco-inspired sea baths at Eastern Beach, and discover isolated beaches and award-winning wineries all from this stylish launchpad.

Relax with a dip in the indoor pool or head to the hotel's waterfront restaurant, Tempo Kitchen & Bar, celebrating the rich tapestry of Victoria's local produce and flavours. Be it with friends or family, take advantage of the signature Novotel hospitality as you unwind in the plush rooms and make the most of your Geelong adventure.
offer_address: 10-14 Eastern Beach Road, Geelong, Victoria 3220, Australia

title: Stylish Central Geelong Escape near Corio Bay with Daily Breakfast
description: Enjoy a leisurely stay at this conveniently located jewel in the heart of Geelong, a few minutes away from the delightful Corio Bay. With a sparkling outdoor pool and a location only minutes from Eastern Beach, days by the water are yours to savour. Explore the nearby Botanic Gardens, walk along the charming Corio Bay foreshore or explore the nearby wineries and breweries on the Bellarine Peninsula. When hunger hits, dine in at Nautica Bar & Kitchen to indulge in fresh, locally sourced Australian fare and sip on handcrafted cocktails.
offer_address: Myers Street & Gheringhap Street, Geelong, Victoria 3220, Australia

title: Grand Opening: Victoria Surf Coast Winery Escape with Daily Breakfast, Room Upgrade & Outdoor Bathtub Overlooking the Vines
description:
Mt Duneed Estate's brand-new luxury pods are here: and you can be one of the first to stay in an upgraded Vineyard Room with an outdoor bathtub overlooking the vines. Located in Geelong, just over an hour from Melbourne, these ultra-modern, secluded retreats are designed to spoil. Draw a bath, pamper yourself with complimentary local organic products from The Herbalist and sink into the water, taking in the vineyard views from your private terrace. Every detail has been thoughtfully curated - there's even a bath shelf to place your glass of wine (with two complimentary bottles included in your package).

If you can pull yourself away, the estate's romantic acreage is yours to peruse; take a walk along the vines or share a drink in the Garden Bar during the warmer months. You won't have to go far to experience culinary excellence: the onsite The Barrel Hall Restaurant (open Thursday to Sunday) delivers a seasonal lunch menu and the finest selection of estate wines.
offer_address: 65 Pettavel Road, Waurn Ponds Geelong VIC 3216 Australia

title: Waterfront Geelong Escape with Daily Breakfast & A$50 Dining Credit
description:
Find yourself in the centre of it all with a stay at Novotel Geelong - a recently renovated retreat boasting a prime location overlooking the city's waterfront. Home to a flourishing foodie scene and a booming events calendar, Geelong is more than a gateway to the Great Ocean Road. Placing a vibrant network of stylish restaurants and trendy cafés on your doorstep, the Novotel provides a welcome break from the inner-city bustle. Wander across to the Art Deco-inspired Eastern Beach, discover pockets of charm in Little Malop’s historic streetscape or venture out of town to discover isolated beaches, award-winning wineries and world-class surf breaks only 30 minutes away.

After a day of exploration, unwind in the hotel's heated indoor pool or toast your escape on your private balcony. Your waterfront stay is complete with delicious daily breakfast and A$50 drinks and dining credit per room.

**2020 bookings bonus**: Book a stay in 2020 and benefit from a bottle of wine on arrival and valet parking.

**Travelling as a family?** Upgrade to the spacious Superior King Room with a king bed, lounge area and sofa bed for two adults and two children (aged 15 years and under).
offer_address: 10-14 Eastern Beach Road, Geelong, Victoria 3220, Australia

title: Stylish Rydges Geelong Retreat near Corio Bay with Daily Breakfast
description:
Enjoy a leisurely stay at the modern Rydges Geelong, conveniently located in the heart of the Geelong CBD with sweeping views of picturesque Corio Bay. Decorated with contemporary furnishings, this stylish hotel is ideally located for a scenic holiday escape. Dine in at the pool bar and kitchen, where you can indulge in fresh locally sourced Australian fare and sip on handcrafted cocktails by the pool. Immerse yourself in beachfront fun with Rydges Geelong only minutes away from the iconic Eastern Beach Reserve, ideal for an entertaining family outing.

Known for its waterfront esplanade adorned with a 19th-century carousel and Art Deco boardwalk, Geelong isn’t just a football-fuelled town. Explore the botanical gardens, walk along the charming Corio Bay Waterfront or get your adrenaline pumping at the Geelong Adventure Park before relaxing in your comfortable room with panoramic views.
offer_address: Myers Street & Gheringhap Street, Geelong, Victoria 3220, Australia

title: Elegant Bayside Geelong Escape near City Centre with Daily Breakfast & Nightly Cocktail
description:
Experience the allure of Geelong's coastal charms with a stay at this sophisticated hotel, perfectly positioned mere moments from the bustling promenade and the city centre. Take advantage of the hotel's strategic location and explore the local art scene at the Geelong Gallery, indulge in retail therapy at Westfield Geelong and take leisurely strolls along the stunning waterfront.

After a day of discovery, choose to take a refreshing dip in the heated indoor pool or simply, kick back and relax in your well-appointed room. Savour flavour-focused cuisine at Maestro restaurant and bar, boasting a wide array of locally sourced grilled meats, fresh produce, craft beers and wines. For an additional dash of adventure, you can get a bird’s-eye view of Geelong’s green surrounds from the nearby Giant SkyWheel.
location_description: Holiday Inn & Suites Geelong, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: 40 Ryrie Street, Geelong, Victoria 3220, Australia

title: Grand Opening: Luxe Waterfront Geelong Escape with Daily Breakfast
description:
Discover the delights of coastal Victoria with a waterfront stay at the brand-new R Hotel Geelong, a one-hour drive from Melbourne. Overlooking Geelong's vibrant waterfront, this newly opened luxury property offers relaxed hotel room accommodation and self-contained apartments. A triumph in contemporary comfort, the hotel has an old soul - it dates back to 1854, when it was known as the Belle-Vue Hotel and swiftly became a favourite among travellers to the city.

Ready to carry on its tradition as one of the finest hotels in Geelong, R Hotel Geelong offers guests a spectacular location, a short walk from Eastern Beach and Austin Park. Stroll along the waterfront, stopping for a drink or bite to eat at one of the popular local restaurants, check out the interactive National Wool Museum and Geelong Gallery, or take a day trip to the scenic You Yangs mountains. Return to the hotel for coffee at Le Café at R Hotel Geelong, and when you're ready to relax, your cosy hotel room or spacious apartment is ready to welcome you with brand-new facilities, sweeping views and luxurious modern design.
offer_address: 10 Bellerine St, Geelong VIC 3220, Australia

title: Luxe Geelong Waterfront Apartments
description:
Discover the delights of coastal Victoria with a waterfront stay at the brand-new R Hotel Geelong, a one-hour drive from Melbourne. A newcomer to Geelong's vibrant waterfront, this luxury property offers an impressive sanctuary of spacious self-contained apartments. A triumph in contemporary comfort, the hotel has an old soul - dating back to 1854, when it was known as the Belle-Vue Hotel and favourite among travellers to the city.

Ready to carry on its tradition as one of the finest hotels in Geelong, R Hotel Geelong offers guests an excellent location - a short walk from Eastern Beach and Austin Park. Spend your days along the picturesque waterfront, stopping for a drink or bite to eat at one of the popular local restaurants, enjoying a spin on the 19th-century carousel and Ferris wheel, checking out the interactive National Wool Museum and Geelong Gallery, or taking a day trip to the scenic You Yangs mountains. Then, return to the hotel for coffee at Le Café at R Hotel Geelong and your inviting apartment with brand-new facilities, sweeping views and luxurious modern design.
offer_address: 10 Bellerine St, Geelong VIC 3220, Australia

title: Stylish Central Geelong Escape
description:
Stay in the heart of Geelong CBD at Rydges Geelong, your launchpad into the wonders of the city and nearby Bellarine Peninsula. At this centrally-located hotel, you can expect contemporary rooms and a stylish lobby, as well as a generous swimming pool and the ultra-cool Nautica Pool Bar & Kitchen.

Known for its waterfront esplanade adorned with a 19th-century carousel and Art Deco boardwalk, Geelong isn’t just a football-fuelled town. Explore the botanic gardens, walk along the charming waterfront or discover the restaurants, bars and cafés within walking distance of the hotel. Hop in the car and you'll soon reach the Bellarine Peninsula, a welcoming foodie destination home to award-winning wineries, distilleries and cider houses.
offer_address: Myers St & Gheringhap Street, Geelong, Victoria 3220, Australia

title: Luxe Geelong Waterfront Serviced Apartments
description:
Discover the chilled-out vibe of coastal Victoria with a stylish waterfront stay at the R Hotel Geelong, a one-hour drive from Melbourne. Joining Geelong's thriving waterfront in March 2021, this luxury property offers an impressive sanctuary of spacious self-contained apartments. A triumph in contemporary comfort, the hotel has an old soul - dating back to 1854, when it was known as the Belle-Vue Hotel, one of the finest hotels in Geelong.

Continuing this tradition, R Hotel Geelong also offers guests an unrivalled location - a short walk from Eastern Beach and Austin Park. Spend your days wandering along the picturesque waterfront, discovering culinary hidden gems, ride the 19th-century hand-carved carousel or the Giant Sky Wheel, check out the interactive National Wool Museum and Geelong Gallery, or enjoy a scenic road trip to the You Yangs Regional Park. Then, return to the hotel for a bite to eat at Le Café, before retiring to your inviting new, luxuriously modern apartment.
offer_address: 10 Bellerine St, Geelong VIC 3220, Australia

title: Contemporary Bayside Getaway Near Geelong City Centre
description:
Enjoy some well-deserved time away at the Holiday Inn & Suites Geelong, an IHG Hotel, a bright, social hub where the lively promenade and bustling Geelong city centre are just steps away. Get a bird's-eye view of Geelong’s green surrounds from the nearby Giant SkyWheel, or spend the day poolside at your hotel.

When it's time to eat, Maestro restaurant and bar is a flavour-filled showcase of meats, fresh produce, coffee, craft beers and wines. The restaurant transforms into a show kitchen after breakfast - watch the chefs in action as they fire up the grills for lunch and dinner.
location_description: Holiday Inn & Suites Geelong, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: 40 Ryrie Street, Geelong 3220, Victoria, Australia

title: Stylish Novotel Geelong Waterfront Retreat near Eastern Beach with Indoor Pool & Restaurant
description:
Revel in the tranquil charms of one of Victoria's finest regional cities at this contemporary Novotel retreat, overlooking Geelong's serene waterfront. Take advantage of the hotel's prime CBD location and explore the thriving culinary and cultural arts scene, drive along Great Ocean Road and wander along the Art Deco-inspired Eastern Beach.

Back at your hotel, swim laps in the indoor pool or head to the hotel's waterfront restaurant, Tempo and savour lip-smacking preparations starring Victoria's local produce and flavours.
